name: [SCRAPPED] Come Home KIDKID
description:
i am no longer interested in completing this game, but a lot of effort went into it so i figured i should share what i have. hope you enjoy!

to play the game: download and extract the files. you will see an application titled "come home, kid kid". just click that and you're good to go! if you get a warning pop up from windows, just choose the "more info" option and click run anyway.
